title: Can't login to league of legends it says invalid username or password
body:
so couple weeks ago i just finished building my new pc and the first game i downloaded was league i started playing it and everything worked fine it worked for about a weak then i tried login in and it said 'invalid username/password combination please try again' and i checked back to see if i was in the correct region and i was and everything was correct and its saying the same thing even if i try login in the main league of legends page so its been a week now and i really don't know what to do so please help me guys. it would mean a lot{{champion:32}} IM SO SAD   

PLEASE HELP ME RIOT

replies.body: If you ever have trouble accessing your account, our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) may be able to help with regaining access.  If you still have any issues logging in, you can reach out to our account team to take a look at your case  individually by submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or emailing support@riotgames.com.  We'll help you out!
